headline: Outdoor Power Equipment Global Outlook Report 2026: A $48.2 Billion Market by 2030 from $35 Billion in 2024 with Deere & Co., Husqvarna, HONDA, Stanley Black & Decker, and Toro Group Dominating
summary: The global Outdoor Power Equipment Market, valued at USD 35 Billion in 2024, is projected to reach USD 48.20 Billion by 2030, with a CAGR of 5.48%. Key trends driving this growth include technological advancements and the rise of lithium-ion batteries enhancing efficiency and sustainability. Noteworthy innovations include autonomous robotic mowers and improved battery packs. North America leads market growth due to vast geographical landscapes and robust infrastructure investments.
